## Description {#details}

Class to represent integer types.

Note that this class is also used to represent the built-in integer types: Int1Ty, Int8Ty, Int16Ty, Int32Ty and Int64Ty. Integer representation type

Definition at line 42 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/derivedtypes-h">DerivedTypes.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### getBitMask() {#aa67042c8a1bb33ed24119bbc065709dc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t llvm::IntegerType::getBitMask () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return a bitmask with ones set for all of the bits that can be set by an unsigned version of this type.

This is 0xFF for i8, 0xFFFF for i16, etc.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/derivedtypes-h/#l00078">78</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/derivedtypes-h">DerivedTypes.h</a>.

### get() {#a14f7b4f1aed38192fb6b7772eb506bdb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>IntegerType &#42; IntegerType::get (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp; C, unsigned NumBits)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
This static method is the primary way of constructing an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/integertype">IntegerType</a>.

If an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/integertype">IntegerType</a> with the same NumBits value was previously instantiated, that instance will be returned. Otherwise a new one will be created. Only one instance with a given NumBits value is ever created. Get or create an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/integertype">IntegerType</a> instance.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/derivedtypes-h/#l00066">66</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/derivedtypes-h">DerivedTypes.h</a>, definition at line 311 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/type-cpp">Type.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
